scripts.prestart: npm run build && func extensions install
scripts.codegen:generate: apollo codegen:generate --target typescript --localSchemaFile=./schema.graphql --tsFileExtension=d.ts --outputFlat=app/graphql_types --tagName=gql --excludes=node-modules/* --includes=app/**/*.ts --endpoint https://api.github.com/graphql --header "Authorization: Bearer GITHUB_TOKEN"
